base.title: CryptoChefs
base.connectWalletAndNetwork: Please connect your wallet and select the Polygon network.

wallet.title: My Account
wallet.exportTooltip: Careful: Anyone who has access to your private key can access your account. Do export your key only to save it as a backup in a secure environment.
wallet.exportQRTooltip: Careful: Do not show this QR code to anyone. Use this only to import your private key in another device, e.g. your smart phone.
wallet.exportQRExposeConfirm: By confirming, you expose your private key.
wallet.exportPKmsgDescription: By confirming, you download your private key.
wallet.importDescription: Careful: Importing an existing private key will overwrite your current key and account.
wallet.importScanQRDescription: Careful: Importing an existing private key will overwrite your current key and account.
wallet.importConfirmDescription: By confirming, you activate the new key. Are you sure this is the correct key:
wallet.setPasswordDescription: Set a password to protect your private key.
wallet.WalletConnectDescription: Connect a wallet from an external provider.
wallet.PersistentStorageDescription: With persistent storage enabled, your data will not be swiped when you clear your browsers data. Learn more here: https://web.dev/persistent-storage/

buyAroma.fieldHelper: Enter amount of AROMA to buy

HowDoIMintACryptoChefsNFT.question: How do I mint a CryptoChefs NFT?
HowDoIMintACryptoChefsNFT.answer: You can find a step-by-step guide here. In case you still have questions or doubts, just hit us up on Discord.

IGotAnError.question: I got an error/something stopped working. What should I do?
IGotAnError.answer: Drop us a message on Discord or on Telegram, and we will assist you.

WhyCanINotUseWalletXYZ?.question: Why can I not use wallet XYZ?
WhyCanINotUseWalletXYZ?.answer: For the Season 1 mint, you can only use MetaMask. However, we plan to support the most common wallets from Season 2 onwards. As we will be collecting your feedback, tell us which wallet you want us to add for the future.

WhatIsAroma.question: What is AROMA (ERC20)?
WhatIsAroma.answer: AROMA is CryptoChefs’ main utility token that enables you to buy a CHEF NFT, create a recipe later in the game, stake on recipes, and have access to other products and services of CrytpoChefs.

HowCanIAddAROMAToMyMetaMaskWallet.question: How can I add AROMA to my MetaMask wallet?
HowCanIAddAROMAToMyMetaMaskWallet.answer: If it is your first time acquiring AROMA tokens, you will need to add our custom token to your MetaMask wallet to make it visible. For this, you can follow our step-by-step guide here.

WhatIsACHEFNFT.question: What is a CHEF NFT?
WhatIsACHEFNFT.answer: CHEF NFTs are unique tokens representing the player and serve as a basis to participate in our upcoming game. Each NFT is capable of holding up to three crypto recipes simultaneously to compete against Chefs around the globe.

DoesTheRarityOfMyCHEFNFTMatter.question: Does the rarity of my CHEF NFT matter?
DoesTheRarityOfMyCHEFNFTMatter.answer: Unlike other games, we value skill over luck. The rarity level of your NFT does not influence the gameplay itself or the earnings. Every Chef has to prove their skill in the fierce kitchen wars.

HowManyNFTsWillThereEverBe.question: How many NFTs will there ever be?
HowManyNFTsWillThereEverBe.answer: In total, 5’555 CHEF NFTs are roaming the magical kitchen of CryptoChefs. They are not offered all at once, but rather in 9 seasons. Season 1 consists of 255 CHEF NFTs and with each season the price of the NFTs rises.

WhereCanISeeTheDetailsOfMyNFT?.question: Where can I see the details of my NFT?
WhereCanISeeTheDetailsOfMyNFT?.answer: We set up an OpenSea page for you to download the image and see the rarity of each item of your NFT. Just click on your NFT on the collection page, or this link will take you there.
